body_html: Thanks @yifeif. The PR has been updated. The issue was that new version of re2 has not been propagated to mirror.bazel.build yet. I temporarily points to GitHub to fix the build failure. Once mirror.bazel.build is propagated I will create a follow up PR to update.
body_text: Thanks @yifeif. The PR has been updated. The issue was that new version of re2 has not been propagated to mirror.bazel.build yet. I temporarily points to GitHub to fix the build failure. Once mirror.bazel.build is propagated I will create a follow up PR to update.
body: Thanks @yifeif. The PR has been updated. The issue was that new version of re2 has not been propagated to `mirror.bazel.build` yet. I temporarily points to GitHub to fix the build failure. Once `mirror.bazel.build` is propagated I will create a follow up PR to update.
